title: A Year to Remember 1937
brief_description: Collection of newsreel footage which made up Australia’s history in 1937 - Coronation of George VI at Westminster Abbey - Japan looking for steel to feed her furnaces - Rise of General Franco and the outbreak of the Civil War - Lyons re-elected - Sydney’s last steam train - Stinson monoplane disappears over Lamington National park - Zeppelin ‘Hindenberg’ goes up in flames - Hubert Opperman cycles from Perth to Melbourne … and much more. Rated: G
